00074 void RFID_Thread::run(){
00075         while(!stopped){
00076                 switch(state){
00077                                 case running: 
00078                                         emit checkRFID();
00079                                         break;
00080                                 case stopp:
00081                                         state=pause;
00082                                         break;
00083                                 case pause:
00084                                         break;
00085                                 case restart:
00086                                         state=running;
00087                                         break;
00088                 }
00089                 msleep(RFID_REFRESH_RATE_ms);
00090         }
00091         stopped=false;
00092 }
